title: Datasets for the USAboundaries package
text: R package contains datasets USAboundaries package. Please see package documentation installation instructions.

what: Historical state and county boundaries for the United States of America — ahcb_boundaries
title: Historical state and county boundaries for the United States of America — ahcb_boundaries
text: datasets contain polygons historical boundaries United States. boundaries taken Atlas Historical County Boundaries. State boundaries cover period 1783 2000, county boundaries cover period 1629 2000. attribute data includes changes boundaries dates valid. full description columns data frame, see documentation zip files provided AHCB. datasets objects class sf sf package. intended used functions USAboundaries package, data objects can also used . data attributes associated boundaries unchanged available AHCB shapefiles files, exception state_name, state_abbreviation, state_code columns added necessary convience filtering boundaries.

title: Historical state and county boundaries for the United States of America — ahcb_boundaries
text: John H. Long, et al., Atlas Historical County Boundaries,   Dr. William M. Scholl Center American History Culture, Newberry   Library, Chicago (2010), http://publications.newberry.org/ahcbp/. See also   AHCB's   page.

title: Historical state and county boundaries for the United States of America — ahcb_boundaries
text: high resolution boundaries generalized .01 degree   tolerance	(1:2,500,000; 1 inch = 39 miles). low resolution boundaries   generalized .05 degree tolerance (1:12,500,000; 1 inch = 197   miles). See AHCB website higher-resolution shapefiles. See   USAboundaries   package low-resolution state boundaries functions   access data.

what: Cartographic boundary files from the U.S. Census Bureau — census_boundaries
title: Cartographic boundary files from the U.S. Census Bureau — census_boundaries
text: U.S. Census Bureau provides cartographic boundary files current U.S. boundaries. datasets package provide selection boundaries 2020 Census files. objects class sf sf package. intended used functions USAboundaries package, data objects can also used . data attributes associated boundaries unchanged available Census boundary files, exception state_name state_abbreviation columns added necessary convience filtering boundaries.

title: Cartographic boundary files from the U.S. Census Bureau — census_boundaries
text: following objects included package:  congress_contemporary_lores Congressional district boundaries   116th Congress, 1:20m resolution. counties_contemporary_hires County boundaries, 1:500k resolution. counties_contemporary_lores County boundaries, 1:20m resolution. states_contemporary_hires State boundaries, 1:500k resolution. zipcodes Centroids Zip Code Tabulation Areas (2019). See   USAboundaries   package low-resolution state boundaries functions   access data.

title: Cartographic boundary files from the U.S. Census Bureau — census_boundaries
text: U.S. Census Bureau,   Cartographic    Boundary Shapefiles (2020). See U.S. Census Bureau's   "Understanding    Geographic Identifiers (GEOIDs)"   "Geographic   Codes" pages details attribute data.

what: Historical population data for U.S. cities — census_cities
title: Historical population data for U.S. cities — census_cities
text: sf object contains historical population data U.S. cities latitudes longitudes cities. data drawn U.S. Census. data compiled Erik Steiner Jason Heppler Center Spatial Textual Analysis, Stanford University. See description data fuller accounting data gathered.

title: Historical population data for U.S. cities — census_cities
Historical population data for U.S. cities — census_cities
text: object class sf (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 62197 rows 13 columns.

title: Historical population data for U.S. cities — census_cities
text: U.S. Census Bureau Erik Steiner, "United States Historical   City Populations, 1790-2010," Spatial History Project, Center Spatial   Textual Analysis, Stanford University,   https://github.com/cestastanford/historical-us-city-populations/.

title: USAboundariesData 0.3.2
text: Update data files new version sf package.

title: USAboundariesData 0.3.1
text: Minor changes column names consistency across datasets. census_cities now sf object rather just data frame.
